issue.title: libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so: undefined symbol on Ubuntu 12.04 since 2014/01/21

content.raw:
We recommend it but do not assume that any change is ABI compatible. This is why we rebuild all dependent packages for every package released. 

Once a package is off of our buildfarm which rebuilds everything each time it then must be ABI compatible since we cannot rebuild it for you. 

We have talked about having proper ABI versioning but have never been able to reach a consensus. We had REP 9 http://www.ros.org/reps/rep-0009.html but have dropped the Even Odd policy and should deactivate that REP too as it's not actually followable.
